p: It was investigated on the antiplasmodial activity of isolated rotenoid and flavonoids which was extracted from the stem bark of M. usaramensis Taub. using dichloromethane. This study was carried out against the chloroquine-sensitive (D6) and chloroquine-resistant (W2) strains of P. falciparum with an IC 50 value of 21.1 and 28 μg/mL each ( Yenesew et al., 2003).
